original_text:
He will stretch out his hand against the north
    and destroy Assyria,
leaving Nineveh utterly desolate
    and dry as the desert.
korean_text: 여호와가 북쪽을 향하여 손을 펴서 앗수르를 멸하며 니느웨를 황폐하게 하여 사막 같이 메마르게 하리니

sentences.original_text: He will stretch out his hand against the north
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 북쪽을 향해 손을 뻗을 것이며
